segments.text: I would like to make an appointment for a project meeting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , I have Monday or Tuesday available . What day would be best for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to meet on Monday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well then . Are mornings or afternoons best ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to come in the morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will have my assistant check my calendar and get back to you with the exact time . Can you bring me an outline of the project when you come ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I can bring the outline when I come to the meeting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think that we should include the entire committee in the meeting or just our sub-committee ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that we should have just the sub-committee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK then , I will make the arrangements for them to attend . Do you know how to get there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine , we will make sure that we send you all of the information that you need . See you there !
segments.speaker: S2
